org.mini2Dx.tiled
Class TiledMap

java.lang.Object
  org.mini2Dx.tiled.TiledMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
TiledParserListener
public class TiledMap
extends Object
implements TiledParserListener

An implementation of a parsed map from Tiled

Author:
Thomas Cashman

         throws IOException
Constructs a map from a TMX file

Parameters:
fileHandle - A FileHandle to a .tmx file
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if the map file could not be parsed

TiledMap

public TiledMap(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle fileHandle,
                boolean loadMaps)
         throws IOException
Constructs a map from a TMX file

Parameters:
fileHandle - A FileHandle to a .tmx file
loadMaps - True if the tileset images should be loaded
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if the map file could not be parsed

draw

public void draw(Graphics g,
                 int x,
                 int y)
Draws the entire map at the specified coordinates

Parameters:
g - The Graphics context available for rendering
x - The x coordinate to render at
y - The y coordinate to render at

                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int layer)
Draws a layer of the map at the specified coordinates

Parameters:
g - The Graphics context available for rendering
x - The x coordinate to render at
y - The y coordinate to render at
layer - The layer index to render

draw

public void draw(Graphics g,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int startTileX,
                 int startTileY,
                 int width,
                 int height)
Draws a section of the map at the specified coordinates

Parameters:
g - The Graphics context available for rendering
x - The x coordinate to render at
y - The y coordinate to render at
startTileX - The x tile coordinate in the map to start from
startTileY - The y tile coordinate in the map to start from
width - The amount of tiles across the x axis to render
height - The amount of tiles across the y axis to render

draw

public void draw(Graphics g,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int startTileX,
                 int startTileY,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 int layer)
Draws a section of a specified layer of the map at the specified coordinates

Parameters:
g - The Graphics context available for rendering
x - The x coordinate to render at
y - The y coordinate to render at
startTileX - The x tile coordinate in the map to start from
startTileY - The y tile coordinate in the map to start from
width - The amount of tiles across the x axis to render
height - The amount of tiles across the y axis to render
layer - The layer index to render

onLayerRendered

protected void onLayerRendered(TileLayer layer,
                               int startTileX,
                               int startTileY,
                               int width,
                               int height)
Developers can override this method to implement sprite rendering

Parameters:
layer - The TileLayer which was just rendered
startTileX - The x coordinate in tiles where rendering started
startTileY - The y coordinate in tiles where rendering started
width - The amount of tiles that were rendered along the X axis
height - The amount of tiles that were rendered along the Y axis
